about_the_game:
• Attention Players: This game is getting a MASSIVE update on October 15th, 2024! It’ll be WAY more optimized, with new areas, more content, a new interface, and an overall much better look. Thanks!!
    Please be kind. This is the first game that Studio Dark Ocean is developing. One of our developers was severely ill, and we are working as hard as we can on a mega update.

  • ***This game focuses on storytelling, centering around the real-life struggles of a close friend of ours who faced tough times in his youth without the support he needed. It's meant to show how our actions can have consequences that affect not only ourselves but also those we love. It's important to mention that we donate a portion of our profits to organizations that provide mental health services, with a particular focus on those working towards suicide prevention.***

  • ***This is our first game and it is still in the beta phase. We are working hard to deliver the best experience for you. As mentioned above, unfortunately, one of our developers has been diagnosed with a tumor. Because of this (he is undergoing treatment, awaiting surgery, etc.), the beta phase has been extended.***

  • Nevertheless, we are working diligently on the next updates, which will include a complete overhaul of the game's shadow system, improved graphics, enhanced movement, and entirely revamped scenarios. In addition, we'll be adding translations for Portuguese, Italian, Japanese, among other languages.
    Stay tuned, and thank you very much for all the support and kindness in this dark moment.

  • ***If you are playing and encounter ANY bugs, please report them to info@darkoceangames.com, and we will fix them as soon as possible.

  • ***We are always here to hear what you have to say. Drop us an email at info@darkoceangames.com, and we'll be happy to chat!***

------------------------------------

The Midnight Town Stories: Adam's Diary" is an immersive blend of Escape Room, Visual Novel, and Horror/Action genres. Prepare for a journey into the depths of a chilling and enigmatic Limbo, where reality intertwines with the realm of the living and the dead.

You take on the role of Adam, a tormented soul who awakens in the confines of his apartment. Adam wakes up with no memory of the past and how he got there. Your duty is to help him collect all the pages of his diary; only then will Adam recover his memory. But the question remains: Is Adam ready to face the shadows of who he is and the consequences of who he was?

Note: This game contains elements that may be disturbing or trigger unsettling emotions. Player discretion is advised.

Adam's path through the haunting Limbo forces him to confront the painful memories of rejection and isolation, both from himself and his family. The echoes of their disapproval reverberate through the ethereal realm, fueling the shadows that seek to ensnare him further.

As Adam's story unfolds, you'll find yourself immersed in a deeply human narrative that delves into the complexities of mental health and the enduring power of acceptance.

"The Midnight Town Stories: Adam's Diary" urges players to reflect on their own journeys of acceptance and self-discovery, touching on sensitive themes with grace and empathy. Through this mesmerizing exploration of the human condition, may you find solace, healing, and a renewed sense of compassion for yourself and others.

Note: This game contains powerful themes, including depression, acceptance, and substance abuse. It is intended to provoke thought and foster understanding. Please approach with sensitivity and an open heart as you immerse yourself in Adam's poignant tale of self-acceptance and transformation.

Dark Ocean Games is an independent game development studio focused on creating visual novels that raise awareness about mental health issues such as drug addiction, suicide, depression, and self-acceptance. Our mission is to use the power of storytelling to educate and inspire people to take action towards positive change. We believe that by creating engaging and thought-provoking content, we can help break down the stigma surrounding mental health and encourage more open and honest conversations about these important topics.

We are committed to developing visual novel games that can have a constructive impact on people, inspiring them to seek help or take steps towards self-improvement. To fulfill this commitment, we donate a portion of our profits to organizations that provide mental health services, with a particular focus on suicide prevention.

  • ***We are thrilled to present "The Midnight Town Stories: Adam's Diary", our debut game at Dark Ocean Games. From the bottom of our hearts, we hope that players will immerse themselves in this haunting experience, embracing Adam's emotional journey of self-discovery.

    Your support is invaluable, and we eagerly welcome your feedback, questions, and suggestions to help shape our future projects.

    Together, let's embark on a captivating adventure and pave the way for a brighter gaming future. Thank you for being a part of our journey.***

content_descriptors.notes:
The Midnight Town Series: Adam's Diary is a "First-Person Horror Visual Novel". The game is based on real events; however, the gameplay has been created for fictionalization and to enhance player immersion. Nevertheless, the story contained within the diary pages is genuine.

The game was developed with the support of psychologists and has the primary objective of raising awareness among players about mental health issues such as depression, self-acceptance, and also drug addiction.

We are committed to developing games and books that can have a constructive impact on people, inspiring them to seek help or take strides towards self-improvement (For more information and to support the cause please visit our website: https://www.darkoceangames.com/). To fulfill this commitment, we donate a portion of our profits to organizations that provide mental health services, with a particular focus on those working towards suicide prevention.

If you or someone you know is struggling with mental health issues, please feel free to contact us at info@darkoceangames.com. We can guide you to the best resources and support available.

short_description: Adam wakes up trapped in his apartment building, where darkness and strange visions abound. To unravel the mystery and escape, he must find missing diary pages, embarking on a heart-pumping First Person Escape Room Adventure in 'The Midnight Town Stories: Adam's Diary.
